channel.title: Inexperienced, and need advice on capabilities of Axoloti core
channel.description: I am working on a project that uses lasers to trigger midi notes. I would like a physical switch that selects between different instruments, and two other physical switches that can change the parameters of the sound, e.g attack, release. I would like the project to have a built in speaker, but have the option of switching to external speakers, anyone know if I can achieve these things with the Axoloti? Thanks in advance!

item.title: Inexperienced, and need advice on capabilities of Axoloti core
item.dc:creator: @JeremyPostman
item.description:
@JeremyPostman wrote:

Indeed it is. Only trouble is I have no experience coding so no idea how to start getting all controls to work how I want them

Read full topic

item.title: Inexperienced, and need advice on capabilities of Axoloti core
item.dc:creator: @JeremyPostman
item.description:
@JeremyPostman wrote:

Hi, thanks for response! I intend to use a physical 3 way switch to select instrument. As for the sound parameters I was hoping that these could be some sort of slider? so that they can be controlled "live" as it were. Do you know of any similar pojects that I could have a look at?

Read full topic
item.source: Inexperienced, and need advice on capabilities of Axoloti core

item.title: Inexperienced, and need advice on capabilities of Axoloti core
item.dc:creator: @servandisco servando barreiro
item.description:
@servandisco wrote:

all of this can be done easily but you will need a little amp for the "internal" speaker. (can be a 5v integrated amp powered by axo)
also, what do you mean by "switch"?. a two position switch? / momentary? , still, yes, it can be done.

Read full topic
item.source: Inexperienced, and need advice on capabilities of Axoloti core
